name: Kids Help Phone
description: Canada's only 24/7, national support service. Professional counselling, information, and referrals for young people in English and French.
description_fr: Le seul service de soutien national 24/7 au Canada. Counseling professionnel, information et références pour les jeunes en anglais et en français.
synthetic_queries_fr: J'ai besoin de parler à quelqu'un
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: All youth (5-29) in Canada. Mental health support. Exclusion: None (24/7 anonymous).
access_script: Hi, I'm feeling really overwhelmed right now and just need someone to talk to. Is this a safe place to share?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : All youth (5-29) in Canada. Hommestal health support. Exclusion : Aucune (24/7 anonymous).

name: Trans Lifeline
description: Grassroots hotline offering direct emotional and financial support to trans people in crisis. Operated by trans people for trans people.
description_fr: Ligne d'assistance locale offrant un soutien émotionnel et financier direct aux personnes trans en crise. Géré par des personnes trans pour des personnes trans.
synthetic_queries: Coming out advice from trans person
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Trans, non-binary, and questioning individuals. Peer support. Exclusion: Cisgender individuals seeking info (refer to allies line).
access_script: Hi, I'm trans and I'm really struggling with dysphoria today. Can I talk to someone who understands?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Trans, non-binary, and questioning individuals. Peer support. Exclusion : Cisgender individuals seeking info (refer to allies line).

name: Hope for Wellness Helpline
name_fr: Ligne d'écoute d'espoir pour le mieux-être
description: Immediate mental health counselling and crisis intervention for all Indigenous peoples across Canada. Available 24/7.
description_fr: Counseling immédiat en santé mentale et intervention de crise pour tous les peuples autochtones du Canada. Disponible 24/7.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: First Nations, Inuit, and Métis peoples across Canada. Culturally competent counselling.
access_script: Hi, I am Indigenous and I'm having a hard time. I'd like to speak with a culturally safe counsellor.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Premières Nations, Inuit, and Métis peoples across Canada. Culturally competent counselling.

name: Assaulted Women's Helpline
description: 24-hour telephone and TTY crisis line for all women in Ontario who have experienced any form of abuse.
description_fr: Ligne de crise téléphonique et ATS 24h/24 pour toutes les femmes en Ontario ayant subi toute forme de violence.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Women in Ontario experiencing abuse/violence. Exclusion: Men (refer to other lines).
access_script: Hello, I am in an unsafe situation at home and I need to know my options for leaving.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Femmes in Ontario experiencing abuse/violence. Exclusion : Hommes (refer to other lines).

name: Immigrant Services Kingston & Area (ISKA)
name_fr: Services aux immigrants de Kingston et de la région (ISKA)
description: Settlement services for immigrants and refugees. Assistance with housing, employment, language, and community connection.
description_fr: Services d'établissement pour les immigrants et les réfugiés. Aide au logement, à l'emploi, à la langue et à la connexion communautaire.
address: 837 Princess St, Unit 201, Kingston, ON K7L 1G9
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Newcomers, immigrants, refugees in KFL&A. Settlement support. Exclusion: None.

name: Trellis HIV & Community Care
description: Support for individuals affected by HIV/AIDS and STBBIs. Harm reduction supplies, education, and stigma-free support.

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to all. Focus on HIV/STBBI and substance use. Exclusion: None.

name: KEYS Job Centre
description: Comprehensive employment services for job seekers, including resume help, workshops, and job matching. Specialized support for newcomers and youth.
description_fr: Services d'emploi complets pour les chercheurs d'emploi, y compris aide au CV, ateliers et jumelage d'emplois. Soutien spécialisé pour les nouveaux arrivants et les jeunes.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Unemployed or underemployed individuals. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm looking for work and need help with my resume. Can I book an appointment with a counsellor?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Sans emploi or underemployed individuals. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: Seniors Association Kingston Region
name_fr: Association des aînés de la région de Kingston
description: Recreation, education, and social activities for adults 50+. Promoting active living and community connection.
description_fr: Activités récréatives, éducatives et sociales pour les adultes de 50 ans et plus. Promotion de la vie active et de la connexion communautaire.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Adults 50+. Membership fees may apply for some programs. Exclusion: Under 50.
access_script: Hi, I'm interested in joining the Seniors Association. Can I come in for a tour?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Adultes 50+. Membership fees may apply for some programs. Exclusion : Under 50.

name: Community Living Kingston and District
description: Support and advocacy for individuals with intellectual disabilities. Residential, employment, and community inclusion services.
description_fr: Soutien et défense des droits des personnes ayant une déficience intellectuelle. Services résidentiels, d'emploi et d'inclusion communautaire.
address: 541 Days Rd, Unit 6, Kingston, ON K7M 3R8
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Individuals with intellectual disabilities and their families. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm looking for support services for my adult child with an intellectual disability. Who can I speak to?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Individuals with intellectual disabilities and their families. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: ReStart Kingston
description: Employment services and job search support. access to job boards, training, and employer connections.
description_fr: Services d'emploi et soutien à la recherche d'emploi. Accès aux babillards d'emploi, formation et connexions avec les employeurs.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Unemployed or underemployed individuals. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I need help finding a job. Do I need an appointment to see an employment counsellor?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Sans emploi or underemployed individuals. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: ACFOMI
description: Bilingual employment and settlement services. Helping French-speaking newcomers and job seekers integration into the community.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: French-speaking individuals, authorized to work in Canada. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Bonjour, je cherche de l'aide pour trouver un emploi à Kingston. Offrez-vous des services en français?
description_fr: Services bilingues d'emploi et d'établissement. Aide à l'intégration des nouveaux arrivants et des demandeurs d'emploi francophones.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : French-speaking individuals, authorized to work in Canada. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: YMCA of Eastern Ontario
description: Community centre offering fitness, aquatics, day camps, and youth programs. Promoting health and wellness for all ages.
description_fr: Centre communautaire offrant conditionnement physique, activités aquatiques, camps de jour et programmes jeunesse. Promotion de la santé et du bien-être pour tous les âges.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to all. Membership fees apply (financial assistance available). Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm interested in a gym membership. Do you offer financial assistance or subsidized rates?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Ouvert à tous. Membership fees apply (financial assistance available). Exclusion : Aucune.

name: BGC South East (Boys and Girls Club)
description: Safe, supportive place for children and youth. Offering after-school programs, camps, sports, and educational activities.
description_fr: Lieu sûr et solidaire pour les enfants et les jeunes. Offre des programmes parascolaires, camps, sports et activités éducatives.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Children and youth. Membership required (often low cost/free access). Exclusion: Adults (except for specific programs).
access_script: Hi, I'd like to register my child for the after-school program. Is there space available?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Enfants and youth. Membership required (often low cost/free access). Exclusion : Adultes (except for specific programs).

name: H'art Centre
description: Inclusive arts hub providing opportunities for people with disabilities to study, practice, and produce works in the arts.
description_fr: Carrefour artistique inclusif offrant aux personnes handicapées des opportunités d'étudier, de pratiquer et de produire des œuvres artistiques.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Adults with intellectual/physical disabilities. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm interested in your art programs for my sibling with a disability. Can we visit the studio?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Adultes with intellectual/physical disabilities. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: Loving Spoonful
description: Connecting people with healthy, fresh food. Programs include community gardens, cooking workshops, and Grow-A-Row.
description_fr: Connecter les gens avec des aliments sains et frais. Les programmes incluent jardins communautaires, ateliers de cuisine et cultiver un rang.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to community members interested in food security. Programs vary. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'd like to learn more about joining a community garden or cooking workshop.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Open to community members interested in food security. Programs vary. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: Ongwanada
description: Non-profit organization supporting people with developmental disabilities and their families. Community-based services and residential support.
description_fr: Organisme à but non lucratif soutenant les personnes ayant une déficience intellectuelle et leurs familles. Services communautaires et soutien résidentiel.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Individuals with developmental disabilities. Referral required for some services. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I need information about support services for my child with a developmental disability.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Individuals with developmental disabilities. Référence requise for some services. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: Kingston Military Family Resource Centre (KMFRC)
name_fr: Centre de ressources pour les familles des militaires de Kingston (CRFMK)
description: Dedicated support for military families. Mental health services, child care, deployment support, and community integration.
description_fr: Soutien dédié aux familles des militaires. Services de santé mentale, garde d'enfants, soutien au déploiement et intégration communautaire.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Canadian Armed Forces members and their families. Exclusion: General public (some programs may be open).
access_script: Hi, my partner is being deployed and I'm looking for support resources for our family.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Canadian Armed Forces members and their families. Exclusion : General public (some programs may be open).

name: EarlyON Child and Family Centre (KCHC)
name_fr: Centre pour l'enfant et la famille ON y va (KCHC)
description: Free high-quality drop-in programs for families and children from birth to 6 years old. Learn and play together.
description_fr: Programmes sans rendez-vous gratuits de haute qualité pour les familles et les enfants de la naissance à 6 ans. Apprendre et jouer ensemble.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Children 0-6 years and their parents/caregivers. Free. Exclusion: Children over 6.
access_script: Hi, I have a 2-year-old and I'm looking for a playgroup. Do I need to register for the drop-in?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Enfants 0-6 years and their parents/caregivers. Free. Exclusion : Children over 6.

name: Habitat for Humanity Kingston ReStore
description: Home improvement retail store selling new and gently used building materials and furniture. Proceeds support affordable housing.
description_fr: Magasin de rénovation vendant des matériaux de construction et des meubles neufs et usagés. Les profits soutiennent le logement abordable.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to the public. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I have some furniture I'd like to donate. Do you offer pick-up services?
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Open to the public. Exclusion : Aucune.

name: Kingston Access Services (Access Bus)
description: Specialized transit service for persons with disabilities who are unable to use conventional transit.
synthetic_queries: Transit for seniors with mobility issues
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Registered clients with disabilities preventing use of regular transit. Application required. Exclusion: General public.
access_script: Hi, I'd like to apply for the Access Bus service. How do I start the registration process?
description_fr: Service de transport spécialisé pour les personnes handicapées incapables d'utiliser le transport conventionnel.
eligibility_notes_fr: Inclusion : Clients enregistrés with disabilities preventing use of regular transit. Application required. Exclusion : General public.

name: Kingston Community Medical Clinic
description: Walk-in medical clinic providing primary care services to residents without a family doctor.
description_fr: Clinique médicale sans rendez-vous offrant des soins primaires aux résidents sans médecin de famille.

name: 988 Suicide Crisis Helpline
description: Canada's national suicide crisis helpline. Call or text 988 for immediate support 24/7.
description_fr: Ligne nationale de crise suicidaire du Canada. Appelez ou textez le 988 pour un soutien immédiat 24h/24.

name: ConnexOntario
description: Ontario's mental health, addiction, and problem gambling helpline. Call, text, or chat 24/7.
description_fr: Ligne d'aide de l'Ontario pour la santé mentale, les dépendances et le jeu compulsif. Appelez, textez ou clavardez 24h/24.

name: Talk Suicide Canada
description: National suicide prevention service providing crisis support via phone and text.
description_fr: Service national de prévention du suicide offrant un soutien de crise par téléphone et texto.

name: Kids Help Phone
description: Canada's only 24/7 counselling and support service for young people. Call, text, or chat.
description_fr: Le seul service de counseling et de soutien 24h/24 au Canada pour les jeunes. Appelez, textez ou clavardez.

name: Good2Talk
description: Free, confidential support for post-secondary students in Ontario. Mental health and addiction services.
description_fr: Soutien gratuit et confidentiel pour les étudiants postsecondaires en Ontario. Services de santé mentale et de dépendance.

name: Hope for Wellness Helpline
name_fr: Ligne d'écoute d'espoir pour le mieux-être
description: Immediate crisis intervention and counselling for Indigenous peoples across Canada. Available in multiple Indigenous languages.
description_fr: Intervention de crise immédiate et counseling pour les peuples autochtones au Canada. Disponible en plusieurs langues autochtones.

name: Talk4Healing
description: Helpline for Indigenous women across Ontario. Culturally grounded support for wellness, relationships, and crisis.
description_fr: Ligne d'aide pour les femmes autochtones en Ontario. Soutien culturellement adapté pour le bien-être, les relations et les crises.

name: Trans Lifeline
description: Peer support hotline run by trans people for trans and questioning people. No non-consensual active rescue.
description_fr: Ligne de soutien par les pairs gérée par des personnes trans pour les personnes trans et en questionnement.

name: Assaulted Women's Helpline
name_fr: Ligne d'aide pour les femmes agressées
description: Crisis counselling, safety planning, and referrals for women who have experienced abuse. Anonymous and confidential.
description_fr: Counseling de crise, planification de sécurité et références pour les femmes victimes de violence. Anonyme et confidentiel.

name: Ontario Problem Gambling Helpline
name_fr: Ligne d'aide pour le jeu compulsif de l'Ontario
description: Confidential support for individuals and families affected by problem gambling.
description_fr: Soutien confidentiel pour les personnes et les familles touchées par le jeu compulsif.

name: Telehealth Ontario
description: Free, confidential health advice from a registered nurse. Available 24/7 for any health question.
description_fr: Conseils de santé gratuits et confidentiels d'une infirmière autorisée. Disponible 24h/24 pour toute question de santé.

name: Ontario Poison Centre
description: Emergency poison information and treatment advice. For poisoning emergencies, call immediately.
description_fr: Information sur les empoisonnements et conseils de traitement d'urgence. En cas d'empoisonnement, appelez immédiatement.

name: National Eating Disorder Information Centre
name_fr: Centre national d'information sur les troubles de l'alimentation
description: Support, resources, and referrals for individuals affected by eating disorders.
description_fr: Soutien, ressources et références pour les personnes touchées par les troubles de l'alimentation.

name: PFLAG Canada
description: Support for families, friends, and allies of LGBTQ2S+ people. Peer support and resources.
description_fr: Soutien aux familles, amis et alliés des personnes LGBTQ2S+. Soutien par les pairs et ressources.

name: Crisis Text Line
description: Free, 24/7 text-based crisis support. Text HOME to 686868 to connect with a trained crisis responder.
description_fr: Soutien de crise par texto gratuit 24h/24. Textez PARLER au 686868.

name: 211 Ontario
description: Information and referral to community, government, social, and health services across Ontario.
description_fr: Information et références vers les services communautaires, gouvernementaux, sociaux et de santé en Ontario.
